articles.author: Richard Henderson
articles.title: Asia to Join Global Equity Rally Ahead of US CPI: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Stocks in Asia and European and US equity futures climbed as a plan for Donald Trump and Xi Jinping to meet eased nerves around a trade war. Treasuries were steady ahead of US inflation data.
articles.content:

articles.title: As Trump makes rare visit to Malaysia, PM Anwar’s balancing act faces test - Al Jazeera
articles.description: US president’s Malaysia visit puts spotlight on Southeast Asian country’s effort to walk fine line between great powers.

articles.title: Black and Hispanic Enrollment Drops, Asian Enrollment Rises for Harvard’s Class of 2029 - The Harvard Crimson
articles.description: The proportion of Black and Hispanic students enrolled in Harvard College’s freshman class dropped in the second year after the Supreme Court overturned race-conscious undergraduate admissions, according to data released by Harvard on Thursday.
